name: Intertwined (stonegolem13)
description:
Intertwined is my entry for the GMTK Game Jam 2021, the theme was "Joined Together".

In Intertwined, you collect light energy and defeat enemies to travel through a connected dark dimension to reach the end portal.  Objects moved in the light dimension affect the connected object in the dark dimension, but not the other way around.

Hope you enjoy!

The game was developed in Godot, source code available here.
